name: NONOGRAM - GIRL's SWEETS
description:
The puzzle game "NONOGRAM" is a logical puzzle that completes a picture by guessing which grid you want to fill from a hint.

Feature
Let's solve 10 puzzles and complete one anime-like illustration!
To complete a total of 9 illustrations, you have to solve a total of 90 puzzles.


Notice
The graphics and musics in this game are used with official permission.
